title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2 and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; chat, stream, and pull models via Ollama’s REST API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode, mobile friendly).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper for Ollama with syntax highlighting, chat history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension powered by local Ollama models for inline code completions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + Sentence-Transformers + Chroma to chat with local documents.

title: ollama-hub
summary: Community registry of custom Ollama Modelfiles, adapters, and quantized GGUF models.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters; chat, generate, pull, list models.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images for Ollama (CPU & CUDA) with one-line run commands and docker-compose samples.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and autoscaling.

title: ollama-gpt4all
summary: GPT4All backend that wraps Ollama, letting you use GPT4All’s GUI with any Ollama-managed model.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed models and dependency-injection friendly clients.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app that plugs into local Ollama, featuring markdown, code highlighting, and session memory.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server with slash commands and role gating.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django package adding Ollama LLM & embedding backends plus admin UI for model selection.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async/tokio bindings to Ollama’s REST API with serde models.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve example deploying Ollama models for distributed inference and autoscaling.

title: ollama-hackernews
summary: Hacker News discussion on Ollama’s open-source ecosystem and community-built tools.
